send_mode.title: Send mode
send_mode.description: Code mode is for sending Python code in the REPL. Text mode is for communicating with the microcontroller when your Python code contains the print() function.

enter_to_send.title: Enter to send, Shift-Enter to make newline
enter_to_send.description: When not selected, the shortcuts will be reversed. This setting is applicable exclusively in code mode. In text mode, however, both shortcuts function to send text.

force_exec.title: Enforce execution of sent code
force_exec.description: When selected, this option ensures code executes instantly upon submission, interrupting any active processes. This configuration is applicable exclusively in code mode.

hide_cv.title: Hide <CV> communication
hide_cv.description: When deselected, raw communication data for connected variable widgets will be displayed.
